amendatorysection.chaptername: Decedents' Estates; Protection of Persons and Property
amendatorysection.catchline: Remedy for breach of contract to appoint or not to appoint.
amendatorysection.para: The remedy for a powerholder's breach of a contract to appoint or not to appoint appointive property is limited to damages payable out of the appointive property or, if appropriate, specific performance of the contract.
